caption.title: Self-assembly mode analysis of packing nanoparticles in a crystal.
caption.p: ( A) View of the superlattice from the x axis, ( B) y axis, and ( C) z axis. ( D) Packing of a dextroisomer with the six nearest levoisomers. Magenta and yellow, gold atoms in left- and right-handed enantiomers; green, sulfur; gray, carbon; white, hydrogen. ( E and F) Weak interactions between ligands in neighboring nanoparticles. Magenta and yellow, carbon atoms in left- and right-handed enantiomers; green, sulfur; white, hydrogen. Red dashed lines, C-H⋅⋅⋅π interaction; blue dashed lines, H⋅⋅⋅H interaction.
